snippet: CUFFARO--Harriet. City and Country School mourns the passing of Harriet Cuffaro, a teacher and advisor at C&C, starting in 1954. Committed believer in progressive education, loyal supporter of C&C, master of the probing question in search of a deeper perspective, and feisty advocate for the rights and responsibilities of citizens in a democratic society, Harriet leaves a powerful legacy. Generations of C&C students and colleagues benefitted from her guidance. We will remember her teachings and cherish her memory. Kate Turley, Principal, for the City and Country community 1/3
